name: music
description: ```     /package.json         npm run init-dev             安装全局&本地依赖         npm run init-dev-g           安装全局依赖         npm start                    启动 全部服务 ```

scripts.start: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Api,Music"  "cd NeteaseCloudMusicApi && node server" "cd webMusic && npm start"
scripts.init-dev: npm run init-dev-i && npm run init-dev-g
scripts.init-dev-i: npm run init-app && npm run init-music && npm run init-api
scripts.init-dev-g: npm i -g -d webpack webpack-dev-server concurrently typescript nodemon
scripts.build: npm run build-music && npm run build-app
